messages.title: Vote Labour this Thursday to protect our NHS
messages.content: Don't risk 5 more years of the Conservatives; Charing Cross Hospital remains under threat of demolition. Waiting times are among the worst in the country since Hammersmith A&E closed. Ambulances are taking up to two hours to arrive at emergencies.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Andy Slaughter is focused on protecting NHS services and fighting against hospital closures and service reductions.

issues.health: Charing Cross Hospital remains under threat of demolition. Waiting times are among the worst in the country since Hammersmith A&E closed. Ambulances are taking up to two hours to arrive at emergencies.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will always put our NHS first and fight to save our hospitals.

images.caption: Vote Labour this Thursday to protect our NHS
